import React from 'react' import goods from '../../../db/goods' const GoodList = () => { const goodArticles = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) const goodsInCart = goods.filter(good => goodArticles.includes(good['Артикул'])) return ( {/* */} {goodsInCart.map(good => { return ( ) })}

) function imgPrefix(good) { const artcl = good['Артикул'][0] let prefix = './img/' switch(artcl) { case '0': prefix += 'cpu/' break case '1': prefix += 'mb/' break case '2': prefix += 'ram/' break case '3': prefix += 'vc/' break case '4': prefix += 'hdd/' break case '5': prefix += 'bp/' break case '6': prefix += 'cool/' break default: break } return prefix } } export default GoodList
